results.description:
This application is a service of Singapore Government.
 
Be empowered for an all new travelling experience
 
MyTransport.SG Mobile, an award winning app launched by Land Transport Authority (LTA), is a content-rich service offering a wide range of information for all modes of land transportation – empowering commuters, motorists and cyclists in Singapore to make informed decisions and better plan their journey, with these features:
 
• Personalise your favourite services with MyConcierge
• Search and locate nearby bus stops and service number with bus route details
• Get real-time island-wide bus arrival information
• Search and locate nearby taxi stands and quick dial for taxi booking services
• Report road defects via Snap & Send 
 
• Get real-time parking lots availability for popular locations
• Plan route with Traffic News and ERP Gantries on Traffic Smart
• View live traffic images along all expressways round the island
• Receive notification on expressways traffic news during peak hours and train service delay information
• Explore cycling towns, routes, and parking facilities
• Find out lifestyle events and promotions nearby
 
This app is proud to be a multiple local and international awards winners in:
 
• 2014 Best Global m-Government Service Award, Dubai
• 2013 Singapore infocomm Technology Federation (SiTF) Awards, Gold Winner in Most Popular Mobile Apps category and Silver Winner in Mobile Applications category
• 2013 UiTP Grow with Public Transport International Awards, Integrated Mobility category
• 2013 eGov Excellence Awards,  Distinguished Winner in mServices category
• 2013 Singapore Mobile Excellence Awards, Gold Winner in Best App/Content by Government/Community category
• 2012 Summit Emerging Media Awards, Visionary Award in Navigation App category 
• 2012 W3 Awards, Silver Award in Maps and Navigation mobile app category
 
For the full suite of land transport information and e-Services, please visit: http://www.mytransport.sg
 
Disclaimer: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

This application is a service of the Singapore Government.

myCPF provides you with easy access to your personal CPF information on the go. It also provides you with a quick way to perform Retirement Sum Top-Ups and calculate the amount of CPF contributions payable. You can access your CPF information via the following services using your SingPass:

•My Dashboard 
•My Healthcare
•My Housing 
•My Investment 
•My Messages 
•Transaction History
•Contribution History 

For the full suite of CPF online services, please visit www.cpf.gov.sg.
results.releaseNotes:
Introducing the Retirement Sum Topping Up feature!
Now, you can top up CPF savings using cash or CPF for yourself and your loved ones.
 
As part of our ongoing enhancements, myCPF mobile app biometric login has been integrated with the recently launched SingPass mobile app. Also comes with minor app fixes and improvements to usability.

results.description:
Get the latest environmental news updates and information at your finger tips with myENV:

• Access real-time information on Singapore’s weather and receive push-notification alerts when raining at certain locations

• View latest PSI & hourly PM2.5 information

• Locate dengue clusters

• Search for hawker centre by name, region or address

• View latest NEA’s events and happenings

• Obtain useful information such as list of licensed food caterers

• Convenience of providing feedback to NEA
----------------------------------
myENV app will need access to certain features on your phone for the following reasons:

• Location
Use your phone’s location to provide you with localised weather information.
 
• Phone
Let you call NEA hotline conveniently with just one touch.
 
• Photos/Media/Files
Allow you to save photographs taken with myENV app in your phone and to attach them when you file a       report to NEA.
 
• Camera
Access the phone’s camera if you wish to attach a photograph while making a Report to NEA.
 
• Device ID & Call Information 
Read your phone’s UUID so that you can register and receive push notifications.
----------------------------------

For a full suite of information and online services, please visit http://www.nea.gov.sg or follow NEAsg on Twitter to receive more updates.

Formed on 1 July 2002, the National Environment Agency (NEA) is the leading public organization responsible for improving and sustaining a clean and green environment in Singapore. The NEA develops and spearheads environmental initiatives and programmes through its partnership with the People, Public and Private sectors. It is committed to motivating every individual to take up environmental ownership and to care for the environment as a way of life.

By protecting Singapore's resources from pollution, maintaining a high level of public health and providing timely meteorological information, the NEA endeavours to ensure sustainable development and a quality living environment for present and future generations.

This application is a service of the Singapore Government.

Tag: NEACQSD00093
results.releaseNotes:
· Separated Food Hygiene/Poisoning Category under “Report to NEA”
· Updated weblinks

results.description:
Calculate parking fees automatically
Key in your vehicle number, select the car park and indicate your estimated parking duration. Your charges will be automatically calculated (free parking timings, whole-day parking, night parking are all included).

Pay for parking  digitally
Pay using your credit or debit card and start parking.

Track and extend your parking session remotely
Receive notifications when your parking session is expiring or has ended. Extend your parking session without having to return to your vehicle.

End your parking session early
End your parking session if you're back at your vehicle early. A refund based on the actual parked duration will be given.
results.releaseNotes: Just internal updates to prep future changes

results.description:
You can access our whole range of services and other features at your convenience.

* Check your sales application results, BTO flats available for selection and their probable completion dates

* View the recent transacted prices of resale flats and the ethnic quotas, at the location of your choice

* Locate and obtain directions to HDB Hub, Branch, and Service Centres

The Housing & Development Board (HDB) is Singapore's public housing authority and a statutory board under the Ministry of National Development.

Note:
* Selected services may require you to use SingPass or eNETS to complete the transaction.
* This application is a service of the Singapore Government.
results.releaseNotes:
- A brand new home screen for more convenient access to our services in Mobile@HDB
- Retrieve car park short-term parking charges for all vehicles types in HDB Map Services and Car Park Information in Augmented Reality
- Compatibility support for iOS 12
- Optimisation​ for iPhone XS and iPhone XS Max

results.description:
This application is a service of Singapore Government.

A new version of NLB Mobile with new nifty features.

Provided by the National Library Board Singapore, the application allows library patrons to:

• Set up multiple user profiles
• Borrow library items by scanning barcodes 
• Manage loans and reservations
• Search the library catalogue
• View events happening at each library

What's new in this release:
• Online payment of fees
• Borrow and read ebooks in the same app
• View loan and reservation histories
• Bookmark favourite items

jobsDB.com is Singapore's leading job search engine with over 125,000 jobs sourced directly from job boards like JobStreet Singapore, company websites and industry associations. With more jobs in real time than anyone else, jobsDB offers you a fail safe way to find that perfect job or to keep an eye on the market. Make sure you don’t miss out – install jobsDB now, it's free.

Search 
- Simple and fast job search
- Browse thousands of jobs across various industries
- Search by job keyword, role title, company and location 
- Refine your search by job type
- Save time by viewing only new jobs since your last search

Personalise
- We remember your recent job searches 
- Fresh jobs are shown with every refresh
- Save or email your shortlisted jobs to yourself
- Turn on alerts for your favourite searches
- Create a free account to access your saved jobs across all devices
- Get the latest jobs sent daily to your inbox or via push notifications

Apply 
- Fast job applications with Quick Apply 
- Update your resume to your profile
results.releaseNotes:
- Access the jobsDB app to search over 125,000+ jobs in Singapore
- Apply for jobs faster with 1 Click Apply. Just upload a resume to your profile first! 
- Bug fixes and improvements

results.description:
The new MyTransport.SG mobile app now offers you with more useful travelling information and new features to help you get around Singapore.  
 
New features of MyTransport.SG:
• Personalisation - Quick access to your frequently used bus service and traffic information.
• My Notifications - Manage push notifications to receive MRT or Road alerts that interest you.
• Near You - View information on nearby bus services, MRT stations or traffic information​ in the vicinity.
• Multi-modal Journey Planner - Start planning your journey with different transport options based on your travel needs.
 
This application is a service of Singapore Government.
 
Disclaimer: Continued use of GPS running in the background may decrease battery life.

Log in within seconds using your fingerprint or 6-digit passcode.

KEY FEATURES

- Say goodbye to long passwords

With the SingPass Mobile app, you don’t have to enter your SingPass ID or password. Simply scan or tap the QR code to launch the app, verify and you’re in!

- Transact securely on-the-go

Going for a holiday or staying overseas? Enjoy greater mobility when you use the new SingPass Mobile app. No more waiting for SMS OTP, or carrying a token around!

- Be secure every step of the way

We’ve got several layers of security measures in place to protect your personal data. You only need to log in with your fingerprint or enter a 6-digit passcode to verify your identity for all transactions.

- Log in like a pro with QR

Log in by scanning a QR code using your SingPass Mobile QR code scanner. If you’re using a mobile device, simply tap on the QR code to launch the app.

- Better together

We will be adding new features into the app to help you manage your data and transactions better, so keep your app updated!

SET UP IN 3 EASY STEPS

To set up, all you need is a smartphone, an internet connection, and a registered SingPass account.

- Step 1
Install SingPass Mobile by clicking the button above.

- Step 2
Complete a one-time set up.

- Step 3
You’re all set. Log in to government digital services using your fingerprint or 6-digit passcode – it’s that simple!

FEEDBACK

We want to hear from you! For feedback, questions or concerns,
please email us at support@singpass.gov.sg.

Note: SingPass Mobile can only be installed on one device at a time.

This application is bought to you by the Government Technology Agency of Singapore.


***
Directed to singpassmobile.sg when you tapped the QR code during login?

This is due to a delay by iOS at times in retrieving the required configuration file (Apple-App-Site-Association), which is necessary for QR code tapping (Universal Link) to work.

Here are some workarounds that worked well with other users experiencing this same issue:
- try again later. Most users reported that iOS managed to retrieve the necessary config after some time
- uninstall SingPass Mobile from your device, and download the app again from the official App Store
results.releaseNotes:
Thanks for using SingPass Mobile! We’re working hard to optimise our app and have made some things a lot better in this release.

What’s new:
- Speed improvement: App is now snappier than before
- Stability enhancements and optimisations

results.description:
This application is a service of Singapore Government.

eAppt@ICA is the latest initiative from the Immigration & Checkpoints Authority (ICA), which allows members of public to book an appointment with ICA to complete their application processes as well as to change or cancel appointments. With eAppt@ICA, everyone will have the following services at their fingertips:
 
1) Book appointments* with all 3 Services Centres of ICA.
2) View existing appointments* made with ICA at 'My Appointment' tab.
3) Locate SingPost outlets for alternate site collection of selected ICA documents and passes.
4) Links to other Home Team Departments' homepage.  
 
Note:
-*Selected services may require you to log in with your SingPass ID before booking an appointment 
- For any enquiries, please email us at ICA_Feedback@ica.gov.sg

This application is a Smart Nation initiative jointly developed by the Municipal Services Office (MSO) and Government Technology Agency (GovTech).

The “OneService” mobile application is part of the Government’s on-going efforts to provide a convenient channel for reporting municipal issues within Singapore. The application provides for common categories of municipal issues and more features will be offered under subsequent updates.

Date of Official Launch: 25 January 2015

To provide feedback on the application, please e-mail us at mso_appenquiry@mnd.gov.sg 

By downloading, you agree to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy of the OneService Mobile App.

URL for Terms of Use: 
https://www.oneservice.sg/terms
URL for Privacy Policy: 
https://www.oneservice.sg/privacy

Keywords: one, service, municipal, services, mnd, mso, singapore government
results.releaseNotes:
- Batch sessions into bills
- Enable multiple vehicle selection
- Bug fixes

results.description:
Volunteers are notified via the myResponder Mobile App by SCDF’s 995 Ops Centre of any Cardiac Arrest Case within 400 metres of their location. If you are notified, you may choose to respond to the incident and offer your assistance. The Mobile App will highlight nearby AEDs that may be available. 

Once you have located the victim suffering from cardiac arrest, you can assist the original caller who alerted SCDF in performing CPR or helping to apply the AED to revive the patient. SCDF’s 995 Ops Centre may also ask responders to guide the ambulance crew by escorting them to the incident site.

If you are 15 years and above and wish to volunteer, be sure to get your SingPass ID and password ready. If you are under 18 years old, please seek parental consent for your participation. Your handphone number is also required for SCDF to get in touch with you during an emergency. 

Your response is entirely voluntary, and we only encourage you to respond when you are available and to do so within safe and reasonable means.

myResponder is the latest project by the Singapore Civil Defence Force. The myResponder Mobile App alerts volunteers to nearby Cardiac Arrest Cases to render first aid before ambulance arrival. With myResponder, volunteers will have the following services at their fingertips:

- Geolocation notification of nearby cases
- Display of nearby incidents using OneMap
- Display of nearby AEDs using OneMap
- Geolocation enabled dialling of 995
- Access to the National AED Registry

Please note that continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

The Singapore Civil Defence Force – The Lifesaving Force
results.releaseNotes:
myResponder version 3.2.1 is now live! Older versions will cease to be supported. Users are encouraged to download the latest version to continue receiving case notifications.

New features include:
· Display of additional information such as operating hours of AED-installed premises.
· Nearest lamp post will now be highlighted if the incident is within a park.
· Users can check connectivity settings in the Support page.
· Bug fixes for Notification and Location services.

results.description:
This application is a service of Singapore Government

Looking for a taxi? Land Transport Authority (LTA)'s Mobile Apps, Taxi-Taxi@SG not only tells commuters the number of taxis available in their vicinity, commuters can also use the app to indicate their need for taxis. 
Commuter locations will be displayed on an integrated map for taxi drivers to easily identify areas with potential commuters.
 
Features:
• Commuters can spot available taxis where-ever they are, whenever they want
• Commuters can easily indicate their need for taxi by tapping on the exact location of choice
• Taxi drivers can get visibility of where commuters have indicated their need for one

Beeline is Singapore's first marketplace for crowdsourced bus services. Our bus routes are derived from insights that we obtain from analysing transportation data and community demand. Private bus operators can make use of these findings to bring convenient, comfortable and direct transportation alternative to those who want them the most, at affordable prices.

This application is a service of the Government of Singapore. The PaC@Gov mobile application is developed by the Accountant-General’s Department to provide Singapore Government serving officers and pensioners with convenient access to their pay, claims and medical bills information. They can submit claims on-the-go and receive notifications anytime, anywhere. 
Date of official launch: 6 February 2017
If you have any query on the application, please send it to us via the “Help” icon on the menu page. By downloading, you agree to the Terms of Use and Privacy Statement of the PaC@Gov Mobile App.
results.releaseNotes: We update the app regularly to make it better for you. Get the latest version to enjoy all available features and improvements. Thank you for using PaC@Gov Mobile App!

results.description:
This application is a service of Singapore Government.

About ACRA On The Go
ACRA On The Go is a mobile extension of key services currently available on BizFile+ - the online business filing and information portal managed by the Accounting and Corporate Regulatory Authority (ACRA). Business owners can perform a range of business registration and filing transactions with ACRA On The Go. The public can access business related information for free as well as purchase business information products.

The following services are available on the ACRA On The Go mobile app: 

∙         Business Registration and Filing services  
Business owners can renew registration for certain business entities, file annual declarations or change address for business entities. Enquiries on the status of selected applications including striking off or Extension of Time that have been filed with ACRA can also be made. 

∙         Directory Search 
Allows users to conduct a preliminary check on business entities, including basic information such as its Unique Entity Number (UEN), entity name, status, and the street name as reflected in its registered business address. 

∙         iShop@ACRA 
To facilitate the purchase of electronic products such as business profile while the customer is on the move.

∙         AGM Calculator 
Enables directors and companies to plan when to hold their next AGMs and also meet the statutory requirements under the Companies Act. 

∙         AskACRA 
An interactive FAQ search service that enables users to easily access FAQs related information on business registration and filing matters.

∙         ACRAConnect
ACRA’s newsletter that keeps readers updated on new regulatory developments including policy and legislative changes, business facilitation initiatives and upcoming events organised by ACRA. 

Date of Official Launch: 7 November 2016 
To provide feedback on the application,
Please e-mail us at
https://www.acra.gov.sg/ask_ACRA_FAQs

SG Parl is an official app by the Parliament of Singapore. It is a one-stop information centre for you to find out more about your Member of Parliament and parliamentary proceedings.
 
The app contains, among others:
 (i) a database of the Members of Parliament listed alphabetically and by constituency, which also includes the venues and times for the weekly Meet-The-People Sessions,
(ii) an interactive seating plan of the Chamber,
(iii) items of business and order of business for upcoming parliament sittings,
(iv) various publications including Bills, Standing Orders and reports and
(v) a glossary of parliamentary terms.

Get the latest commonly used statistics on Singapore’s economy and population from SingStat App. Data are presented in user-friendly charts and tabular formats.
For more detailed Singapore statistics, please visit www.singstat.gov.sg.

The mobile application is designed for devices with iOS 7 and above.

This application is a service of the Singapore Government.

See an interesting animal or plant? Share it with us through this SGBioAtlas app! SGBioAtlas is a citizen-science platform for nature lovers to share their biodiversity sightings and uses crowd-sourced information to map the distribution of flora and fauna across Singapore. It is not only simple to use, it is also a fun way to learn more about the amazing diversity of animals and plants in our City in a Garden. Every sighting you record will contribute to our database of precious local biodiversity. 

This app is brought to you by the National Parks Board (NParks) as part of the Community in Nature (CIN) initiative. As the lead agency on nature conservation, NParks has developed an urban biodiversity conservation model, which aims to conserve representative eco-systems in land-scarce Singapore.  NParks also monitors and coordinates measures to enhance the presence of biodiversity in our urban landscape. 

Date released: 16 April 2015

For technical issues, please e-mail biome_support@neseapl.com

For general queries, please e-mail CIN@nparks.gov.sg.
results.releaseNotes:
1.New edit sighting feature
2.UI refinement for the application
3.Bug Fix

results.description:
Tourego is a paperless and secure mobile app for use in Singapore. Government certified and PDPA compliant, Tourego simplifies the tax refund process for tourists. The app includes comprehensive travel information about Singapore, and also features a shopping list function that can be shared with friends.

Visiting Singapore soon? Download and enjoy!

CPF e-Submit@mobile is a free tool provided by the CPF Board for employers to conveniently e-submit and pay their monthly CPF contributions on-the-go. It is optimised for mobile devices to help employers complete their submissions easily and quickly. It is most suitable for employers with 10 or fewer employees.

Benefits of using CPF-e-Submit@mobile:
a) No pre-registration required
b) Fuss-free submission of your CPF contribution details via any mobile platform
c) Mobile optimised screen for positive user experience
d) Secure payment via:
• eNETS [personal bank accounts from DBS, POSB, UOB, OCBC, Citibank (Maxisave / Ready Credit) and Standard Chartered are accepted]; or
• OCBC Bank ATM / Internet Banking using the Transaction Reference Number (TRN) generated

This application is a service of the Singapore Government.

This application is a service of the Government of Singapore. 
The Vendors@Gov mobile application is developed by the Accountant-General’s Department to facilitate government vendors to monitor their invoices and payments on the go. Vendors can also receive notifications on their invoices, as well as changes in their account status and details.

Date of official launch: 15 June 2016

To provide feedback on the application, please email us at https://app.helpdesk.agd.gov.sg/public_user/vendor/vendor/helpdesk.aspx.
By downloading, you agree to the Terms of Use and Privacy Statement of the Vendors@Gov Mobile App.
results.releaseNotes:
We update the app regularly to make it better for you. Get the latest version to enjoy all available features and improvements. Thank you for using VaG@Gov Mobile App!

New feature: Telegraphic Transfer bank details are now available on mobile App

results.description:
This application is a service of the Singapore Government.

Tired of managing travel claims and receipts? Look no further! My HR Kiosk makes capturing receipts, tracking trip distance and time quick, easy and hassle-free for officers. 
Features: 

1. Create travel expenses anytime, anywhere: 
• Option to create your expense during or after your trip.
• Choose your mode of transport and log in your trip start and end locations and you are done!
• If taking a cab, simply take a picture of your receipt and attach it with the claim.

2. Submit your claims with just a click: 
• With all your receipts itemized in one place, easily review and manage your expenses and claims.
• Simply add each expense and trip and easily submit your expense report to get reimbursed.

3. Other features:
• Predictive location recommendations and intuitive location search.
• Multi-modality with the option to log in claims for taxi, car, bike, bus and MRT.
• Recommended location based on organizational travel history.
• Save your favorite locations and manage at a single place.

Write a review, share your experience and help us improve our app. Start claiming on the move now!

This application is a service of the Singapore Government.

Justice@State Courts mobile app provides information on the hearing dates in the State Courts and other information services such as filling instructions, virtual tour of courtrooms and access to legal aid services for the convenience of public users via its user-friendly interface. The application is available across popular mobile platforms.

CorpPass is the required login method for online transactions with the government. First launched for Singapore-registered business entities and SingPass-backed users, it is now available for foreigners who need to transact with the Singapore government.
 
Enjoy the following benefits with CorpPass.
•             Enhanced data protection for businesses and employees, with separate login IDs for corporate and personal matters
•             Increased convenience to transact with multiple government agencies, with each user having a single corporate digital identity and no longer handling multiple login IDs for different services.
•             Better internal control within businesses, as key personnel can grant and manage employees access to each government digital service.
 
For more information, visit https://www.corppass.gov.sg/corppass/common/userguides
results.releaseNotes:
- Performance improvement and optimisations
- Compatibility with iPhone XS, iPhone XS Max, and iPhone XR
- Compatibility with iOS 12

results.description:
The key features of this app include:
 
Monitoring your health statistics using Apple HealthKit or Fitbit
- Keep track of your height, weight, BMI and calories burnt
- Set your daily steps goal and track your daily steps count
 
View your history of steps taken

Location & Information on HDB Panel Clinics

Push Notifications on HDB health and wellness activities

Health-related Information

This application provided by the Ministry of Social and Family Development allows parents to:

•	Determine if your child is eligible for the Baby Bonus Scheme
•	Have an overview the child’s Baby Bonus benefits
•	Check on Baby Bonus Cash Gift payment schedule
•	Access information on your child’s Child Development Account (CDA) (e.g. remaining CDA cap)
•	Perform e-Services (e.g. change of bank account, change of CDA bank)

Note: 
To access the e-services in this application, SingPass login is required. You need to join Baby Bonus scheme to access the e-services in this application. Please visit www.babybonus.msf.gov.sg/parent to join the scheme.
results.developerName: Ministry of Social and Family Development

results.description:
BP Matters is a new mobile application developed by the Singapore Heart Foundation (SHF) and the Nanyang Polytechnic (NYP), Singapore, to help you monitor your blood pressure regularly.

High blood pressure, also known as hypertension, is a disorder affecting your heart and blood vessels. It is one of the major risk factors for cardiovascular disease and it is a fairly common problem in Singapore. The National Health Survey conducted in 2010 revealed that 23.5% of Singaporeans suffer from high blood pressure, which also means that nearly 1 in 4 Singaporeans are hypertensive.

High blood pressure is often called “the silent killer” as it typically has no symptoms until significant damage has been done to the heart and blood vessels, resulting in many chronic diseases. That is why it is important to keep your blood pressure in check regularly!

Main Features:
- Manual daily entry of blood pressure and pulse rate at any time of the day, or as recommended by the user’s healthcare professional.
- Records data in daily, weekly and monthly formats, with visual graph to help user monitor his/her blood pressure over time.
- Share* up to 3 months of user’s blood pressure and pulse rate data to his/her healthcare professional via email, only applicable with user’s consent.
- Alarm function as reminder to measure blood pressure.
- Daily health tip on how to better manage blood pressure.
- Step-by-step guide on how to measure blood pressure correctly.

Disclaimer:
- BP Matters is a mobile application that is intended to be used as a tool to record and keep track of the user’s blood pressure measurements. It should not be used to diagnose, prevent or treat any condition, nor should it be substituted for professional health care. The information provided in BP Matters is for educational purposes only. For an accurate analysis and interpretation of the data, please consult your doctor.
- The Singapore Heart Foundation assumes no liability for any personal harm or injury sustained as a result of using this mobile application.
- *The data sharing function allows the user to send his/her blood pressure and pulse rate measurements via email to his/her healthcare professional, only with the user’s consent. Otherwise all personal data will be kept strictly confidential.

Beeline Driver App is built for Beeline's bus operator partners. 
Only registered Beeline drivers will be able to use the app.

Beeline is Singapore’s first marketplace for crowdsourced bus services. Our bus routes are derived from insights that we obtain from analysing transportation data and community demand. Private bus operators can make use of these findings to bring convenient, comfortable and direct transportation alternative to those who want them the most -- at affordable prices.

results.description: The EventTech for Gov SG app is the official mobile app for the Event Tech for Singapore Government event. With the app, it’s convenient for you to have an overall look at the programme and design your schedule.
